docs.text: Welcome to the Office of Advanced Research Computing at Rutgers!
docs.title: Home

docs.text:
Here are some resources you might want to consult to learn more about how to use an HPC cluster


Slurm




OARC cluster user guide Amarel/Perceval
 - this is a must-read for any new users, even if you are an experienced Linux user 


intro videos by Kristina


terse slurm tips

web-based access to the cluster (still testing) - only from campus or VPN
